description:
Want to make passive income online? Amazon Kindle has millions of users that want to buy your e-book right now! This Amazon Kindle E-Book Launch Course Will Show You

  1. How To Format Your e-Book for Amazon Kindle in Microsoft Word
    • Microsoft Word Template File Included!
  2. How to Get A e-Book Cover Designed (DIY or Outsourced)
    • I Outsource Most of My Covers for $20 & Show You How I Do it!
  3. How to Market & Promote Your Ebook Successfully
    • The Complete Kindle Marketing Plan Revealed
  4. Marketing Tactics for Post-Launch of Your e-Book
    • I Show You Tactics Used By Pros Making $3,000 to $5,000 per month!


If you are confused about launching your own e-book on the Kindle platform then this course is for you. Sign Up today to start making sales of your e-book right now.
title: How to Launch Your First Amazon Kindle Book
